activity.title: beckn/future-of-work#1
activity.text:
Hi !! ,@ravi-prakash-v 

I am Om , currently pursuing B.Tech at IIT BHU . I'm interested in this project . Can you suggest me how  should I proceed ? I have experience in Gen AI . I will glad if you can give me some starting points and the required skills so that I can understand the implementation of AI better .
